price: 221. Boye nayebisa bino epai ya nani basatana bazali kokita?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
